main event: Observers sighted 15 to 17 unidentified flying objects in formation over the Atlantic, which were confirmed to be the result of satellite decay.
interesting points: The objects appeared to be resembling flying saucers shining like stars with comet-like tails., The sighting was noted to occur at a specific position of 24 43'N 55.8'W., The unidentified objects were moving at high speeds from north to south., The viewing lasted for about 69 seconds., There were two confirmed witnesses, a duty officer and an outlook observer.
